ASSEMBLY CODE: 

ADDI R1, R1, 0x5
ADDI R2, R2, 0xA
ADDI R3, R3, 0xFFF
ADDI R4, R4, 0xC00 // these will sign extend

MUL 	R5, R3, R4 
MULH 	R6, R3, R4 
MULHSU 	R7, R1, R4
MULHU 	R8, R2, R3

DIV 	R9, R2, R1
DIVU 	R10, R4, R1

REM 	R11, R2, R1 
REMU 	R12, R3, R1 

----------------------------------------------

MACHINE CODE: 

00000000010100001000000010010011 
00000000101000010000000100010011 
11111111111100011000000110010011 
11000000000000100000001000010011 
00000010010000011000001010110011 
00000010010000011001001100110011 
00000010010000001010001110110011 
00000010001100010011010000110011 
00000010000100010100010010110011 
00000010000100100101010100110011 
00000010000100010110010110110011 
00000010000100011111011000110011
